full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Request for Proposal: Supply of One (1) Microplate Reader

#### Tender Information

* **Notice Number**: 1000252321
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Publish Date**: 2023-08-04
* **Closing Date**: 2023-08-25T14:00:00

#### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Health Canada
* **Contracting Officer**: Eryn Mathers
* **Contact Email**: eryn.mathers@hc-sc.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: (613) 298-2804

#### Description

Health Canada invites proposals for the supply of one (1) Microplate Reader under the Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI. This requirement is reserved for holders of the supply arrangement only. Suppliers that do not have a supply arrangement for the same category cannot submit a bid.

The responsive bidder already holding a supply arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada who meets the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price will be recommended for contract award.

#### Tender Requirements

* **Tender Method**: Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Solicitation Documents**: Can be downloaded from Buy and Sell Canada

#### End Date

This tender notice is open for 40 calendar days from the date of publication. For the closing date of any solicitation under the supply arrangement, invited suppliers should refer to the solicitation documents.

#### Limitations

* **Limited to Pre-qualified Suppliers**: Only suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI can submit a bid.
* **No Competitive Bidding**: Suppliers that do not have a supply arrangement for the same category cannot submit a bid.

Please review the tender documents carefully before submitting your proposal. For any questions or concerns, please contact Eryn Mathers at eryn.mathers@hc-sc.gc.ca or (613) 298-2804 during business hours.

**Attachments**

* [English Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7890/npp-english-1000252321_0.pdf)
* [French Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7890/npp-french-1000252321_0.pdf)
